name: rogue-origin-apps-main
description: ``` rogue-origin-package/ ├── CLAUDE.md                           ← AI context file (repo root) ├── PROJECT_STRUCTURE.md                ← Folder organization ├── README.md                           ← This file │ ├── frontend/ │   └── ops-hub.html                    ← Dashboard + AI Agent │ ├── apps-script/ │   ├── production-tracking/ │   │   ├── Code.gs                     ← Full backend (~1,900 lines) │   │   └── AI_AGENT_FUNCTIONS.gs       ← AI functions only (if adding) │   │ │   └── barcode-manager/ │       └── Code.gs │ └── docs/     ├── APP_CATALOG.md                  ← Technical reference (all apps)     └── CODEBASE_INVENTORY.md           ← File/function inventory ```
